TopicTitle: Stock Rebalance Project 1.2... Post your craft!

Articles.Content:
The Stock Rebalance Project was put together by Stupid_Chris, for all the people who were annoyed by the ARM parts OP stats. In addition to rebalancing the ARM engines, it also tweaks the performance of other under and overperforming engines, such as the 48-7s (on the high side) and the Poodle and Mk55 (on the low side), and a few utility items, in order to give every part a moment to shine.

Anyway, here's my heavy lifter. Carries 150 tons to low kerbin with over 1000 m/s left in the booster's tanks. It's no single stage to laythe, but I consider it a pretty solid launcher, showing what the mod is capable of.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
